   20: 
   21: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %%% File    : a_SUITE.erl
   23: %%% Author  : Rickard Green <rickard.s.green@ericsson.com>
   24: %%% Description : Misc tests that should be run first
   25: %%%
   26: %%% Created : 21 Aug 2006 by Rickard Green <rickard.s.green@ericsson.com>
   27: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: -module(a_SUITE).
   29: 
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: 
   32: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   33: 	 leaked_processes/1, long_timers/1, pollset_size/1,
   34:          used_thread_specific_events/1]).
   35: 
   36: suite() ->
   37:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   38: 
   39: all() ->
   40:     [leaked_processes, long_timers, pollset_size, used_thread_specific_events].
   41: 
   42: %% Start some system servers now to avoid having them
   43: %% reported as leaks.
   44: 
   45: init_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   46:     %% Ensure inet_gethost_native port program started, in order to
   47:     %% allow other suites to use it...
   48:     inet_gethost_native:gethostbyname("localhost"),
   49: 
   50:     %% Trigger usage of large pids and ports in 64-bit case...
   51:     case erlang:system_info(wordsize) of
   52:         4 ->
   53:             ok;
   54:         8 ->
   55:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state,true),
   56:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(next_pid, 1 bsl 32),
   57:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(next_port, 1 bsl 32),
   58:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state,false),
   59:             ok
   60:     end,
   61: 
   62:     %% Start the timer server.
   63:     timer:start(),
   64: 
   65:     Config.
   66: 
   67: end_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   68:     Config.
   69: 
   70: leaked_processes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   71:     Parent = self(),
   72:     Go = make_ref(),
   73:     spawn(fun () ->
   74:                   Name = leaked_processes__process_holder,
   75:                   true = register(Name, self()),
   76:                   Ps = processes(),
   77:                   Parent ! Go,
   78:                   receive
   79:                       {get_initial_processes, Pid} ->
   80:                           Pid ! {initial_processes, Ps}
   81:                   end
   82:           end),
   83:     receive Go -> ok end,
   84:     {comment, "Testcase started! This test will run in parallel with the "
   85:      "erts testsuite and ends in the z_SUITE:leaked_processes/1 testcase."}.
   86: 
   87: long_timers(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   88:     Dir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   89:     long_timers_test:start(Dir),
   90:     {comment, "Testcase started! This test will run in parallel with the "
   91:      "erts testsuite and ends in the z_SUITE:long_timers/1 testcase."}.
   92: 
   93: pollset_size(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   94:     Parent = self(),
   95:     Go = make_ref(),
   96:     spawn(fun () ->
   97:                   Name = pollset_size_testcase_initial_state_holder,
   98:                   true = register(Name, self()),
   99:                   ChkIo = get_check_io_info(),
  100:                   io:format("Initial: ~p~n", [ChkIo]),
  101:                   Parent ! Go,
  102:                   receive
  103:                       {get_initial_check_io_result, Pid} ->
  104:                           Pid ! {initial_check_io_result, ChkIo}
  105:                   end
  106:           end),
  107:     receive Go -> ok end,
  108:     {comment, "Testcase started! This test will run in parallel with the "
  109:      "erts testsuite and ends in the z_SUITE:pollset_size/1 testcase."}.
  110: 
  111: used_thread_specific_events(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  112:     Parent = self(),
  113:     Go = make_ref(),
  114:     spawn(fun () ->
  115:                   Name = used_thread_specific_events_holder,
  116:                   true = register(Name, self()),
  117:                   UsedTSE = erlang:system_info(ethread_used_tse),
  118:                   io:format("UsedTSE: ~p~n", [UsedTSE]),
  119:                   Parent ! Go,
  120:                   receive
  121:                       {get_used_tse, Pid} ->
  122:                           Pid ! {used_tse, UsedTSE}
  123:                   end
  124:           end),
  125:     receive Go -> ok end,
  126:     {comment, "Testcase started! This test will run in parallel with the "
  127:      "erts testsuite and ends in the z_SUITE:used_thread_specific_events/1 testcase."}.
  128: 
  129: 
  130: %%
  131: %% Internal functions...
  132: %%
  133: 
  134: get_check_io_info() ->
  135:     z_SUITE:get_check_io_info().
